title: Textile Sample, "Sole Dots"
medium:
Medium: linen (98%) and cotton (2%)
Technique: Vertical bands of plain weave joined by long weft floats, with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 31.1 x 62.9 cm (12 1/4 x 24 3/4 in.)
description: Wide vertical bands of plain weave in off-white are joined together by long off-white weft floats. Circles in orange, turquoise, magenta, blue, yellow and violet are formed by discontinuous supplementary weft patterning. Number 417.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile Sample, "Sole Dots".
Medium: linen (98%) and cotton (2%)
Technique: Vertical bands of plain weave joined by long weft floats, with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning. Gift of Alexander H. Girard. 1969-165-1169.
